content.html: I could fix it, but it shouldn't be needed for auth which is a simple form -> post to backend. If blocking things for privacy purposes breaks their site, then they're doing bad things for consumer data and I want no part of them for our renewal.
content.value:
I could fix it, but it shouldn't be needed for auth which is a simple form -> post to backend.

If blocking things for privacy purposes breaks their site, then they're doing bad things for consumer data and I want no part of them for our renewal.
